name: Windy Walker
description:
Windy Walker is a frustrating platformer where you fight against randomly increasing and decreasing wind. An idea I had a little while ago and made in to a prototype, then a nephew found it quite engrossing. So a bit of jiggery-pokery and here we are! All shiny and new. Enjoy 27 short but sweet levels, solve puzzles and try not to get blown in to the spikes.

A million thanks to @kenneywings for his amazing donation pack, you should grab it!
